AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mine Beardling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] younger years, aiding the miners in any way [PAWN_pronoun] could. [PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] reltaively smaller body to wiggle into spaces the adults couldn't, helping to located new veins of precious ore.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Royal Guard's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Growing up with a father responsible for protection of a Dwarf lord gave [PAWN_nameDef] exposure to military training early. Normal studies were less important, but the arts of war were always a priority.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Beardling refugee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Having had [PAWN_possessive] home overrun by greenskins at an early age, [PAWN_nameDef] had to grow up quickly. Survival on the road was harsh, and shame was constant whenever other dawi were encountered.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Ranger's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a ranger. Ranger skills as well as general distrust from other dawi were passed on to [PAWN_objective] from a young age.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Thane child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a thane. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught many skills in youth that would lead to an increased leadership ability, as well as being a solid dwarf.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Engineer's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was an engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] was always around the height of dwarfen technology, and taught the basics early on.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cook's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was from a family of renowned chefs. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in the kitchen while [PAWN_possessive] mother and father prepared meals fit for a lord on a daily basis.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Abductee child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was abducted by humans when [PAWN_pronoun] was a baby. They had planned on leveraging the skills which the dwarfs are renowned for when [PAWN_pronoun] grew up. [PAWN_nameDef] grew too smart and strong for [PAWN_possessive] captors, and eventually escaped.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Brewmaster's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only child of a brewmaster. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up around the brewery while [PAWN_possessive] father meticulously worked on the ale. [PAWN_pronoun] was convinced that [PAWN_possessive] father loved [PAWN_possessive] recipes and ale far more than [PAWN_possessive] only child.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Trader's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a trader and learned how to haggle and bargain; [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days on the road traveling and [PAWN_possessive] nights exploring the local area while playing.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Studious beardling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] pursued education extensively as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] spent all of [PAWN_possessive] free time learning, reading, experimenting, and the like.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a blacksmith and his father was a blacksmith. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up playing around the forge, and began learning the dawi's most valued trade at an early age.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Farm child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were farmers for their clan and grew all manner of crops whether it be for food or export; these skills were passed on to [PAWN_objective] from a young age.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Troubadour child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were entertainers. The family orchestrated elaborate plays, practiced makeup, sang songs, and more.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Blessed child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born under a divine sign. [PAWN_pronoun] was held in high regard from an early age, and was taught many things related to the dwarfen gods.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Thief's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is the child of thieves. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up around the scoundrels of the dwarf populace, knowing that exile would await should one of [PAWN_possessive] parents be caught in the act.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child prodigy
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was obviously intellectually gifted from a very young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned delicate skills faster than other dwarf children, and really took an interest in intellectual pursuits.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Beardling spy
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained to spy by [PAWN_possessive] guildmaster and father. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to sneak around, and gather information to take back to [PAWN_possessive] father, so that perhaps their guild would get a leg up on the other clan guilds.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Beardling grunt
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Growing up in [PAWN_possessive] fathers lab, [PAWN_nameDef] was given the life of a societal elite. [PAWN_pronoun] obtained everything [PAWN_pronoun] desired, and price was never an issue. However [PAWN_possessive] did not partake in the luxury given to [PAWN_possessive]. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] pursued more psychical, and in [PAWN_possessive] fathers eyes, lower class jobs.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Herder child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on the mountain sides, under the tutalege of [PAWN_objective] father, and worked every day on the farm tending to the livestock. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time alone.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dishonored thane's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a thane fallen to shame when [PAWN_possessive] hold was overrun. [PAWN_pronoun] was wrought with shame, as was the rest of [PAWN_objective] family at their failure.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Beardling dreamer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expressive child. [PAWN_pronoun] sang often, and made friends quite easily, whether they were young or old, male or female. [PAWN_pronoun] hated fighting, but when made angry, [PAWN_pronoun] could be dangerous. [PAWN_possessive] temper was quick.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Feral child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was accidentally separated and lost at a very young age from [PAWN_objective] family. [PAWN_pronoun] was lost in the wilderness, and forced to survive on [PAWN_objective] own.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Beardling firekeeper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for keeping the fire in [PAWN_objective] uncle's forge going all day and night. [PAWN_pronoun] took this duty very seriously, and was successful at it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: History student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] spent learned many artistic forms including music and writing. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew older, [PAWN_pronoun] began to study legends of the kings of old as well as the legends of the victories and grudges of ages past.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Beardling of the peaks
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: growing up on the frozen wastes of the mountain peaks, [PAWN_nameDef] only had a scarce number of animals and a few hard-bitten relatives as companions. The lack of social interaction resulted in the development of an interest in engineering but [PAWN_pronoun] never developed any great fondness for others.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Beardling medical student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a family of dwarfen doctors, and chose to maintain the tradition. [PAWN_pronoun] had few friends, but got along with [PAWN_possessive] siblings very well.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Beardling mercenary
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is the child of mercenaries. [PAWN_pronoun] traveled with them, and learned skills and techniques for fighting as well as how to craft simple but useful gadgets.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Beardling loner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was always a loner. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to pursue [PAWN_possessive] passions in solitude, whether it be tinkering with [PAWN_possessive] tools, or lining up [PAWN_possessive] figurines and shooting them down with [PAWN_possessive] crossbow.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Beardling artist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with a passion for art. From a very young age [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to draw, paint, and carve wood or stone into something prettier.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mute beardling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was greatly affected by a traumatic event early in [PAWN_possessive] life. For many years [PAWN_pronoun] refused to speak to people, preferring instead to play with [PAWN_possessive] clan's numerous animals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Pampered beardling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Born to a wealthy merchant's family, [PAWN_nameDef] was raised to be the best, and given every expensive extravagance. This pampered lifestyle which caused [PAWN_objective] to miss many basic lessons others take for granted.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Pyromaniac beardling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: From an early age, [PAWN_nameDef] had an unhealthy fascination with fire and the Irondrakes. [PAWN_pronoun] would set refuse heaps ablaze and become entranced by the flames, [PAWN_pronoun] would absent-mindedly burn [PAWN_possessive]self. One day while playing with a clan drakegun, [PAWN_pronoun] carelessly set flame to all the furniture in [PAWN_possessive] home.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf reclusive child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] didn't learn to speak until [PAWN_pronoun] much later than other dwarf children and even then, [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to keep to [PAWN_objective]self. When [PAWN_pronoun] was in [PAWN_possessive] early dwarf teens, [PAWN_pronoun] made a habit of wandering off from the hold to live in the wilderness for weeks at a time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf scavenger child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up the child of a family that was tasked with searching abandoned and destroyed holds. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to survive on the road, and to always be wary of danger. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to fend off attackers many times, as frequently an abandoned hold acquired new inhabitants quickly.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf sentimental child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a kind child. When anybody had a problem, [PAWN_pronoun] tried to fix it. Being a child, [PAWN_pronoun] did not always succeed and this hurt [PAWN_possessive] sensitive soul. [PAWN_pronoun] dreamed of being a warrior who fights greenskin and skaven raiders.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf sickly child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] suffered from a rare disease. Quarantined from family and clan, [PAWN_pronoun] had minimal social contact, and got little physical exercise. In the sterile hospital environment, however [PAWN_pronoun] became very familiar with science and medicine.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf hunter's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: In the mountains of the olde world, [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by [PAWN_possessive] mother. She taught [PAWN_objective] survival skills; trapping, tracking, shooting and more. [PAWN_possessive] departed father had left behind an old dwarfen rifle, and [PAWN_nameDef] practiced with it every chance [PAWN_pronoun] got.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf child story writer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] was addicted to reading. [PAWN_pronoun] would spend all day hidden away with [PAWN_possessive] nose in a tome. [PAWN_nameDef] was distraught at how rare good tomes were, and [PAWN_pronoun] decided to fill that gap by writing [PAWN_possessive] own stories instead.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf child student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] studied engineering and botany for entertainment. [PAWN_pronoun] was proficient at convincing [PAWN_possessive] peers to do [PAWN_possessive] chores, and made it a goal in life to avoid physical labor.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf child tech enthusiast
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was always enthralled by all of the new gadgets and machines produced by the engineering guild. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time taking intricate gadgets apart and rebuilding them while learning how they worked. [PAWN_pronoun] always felt awkward around others.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf child of the far north
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the far north, in the peaks of the chaos wastes. Despite a dwarf's natural resilience to the taint of chaos, others always thought that something was a bit off with [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf traumatized child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] family was attacked by greenskins when [PAWN_pronoun] was very young. [PAWN_pronoun] barely survived and no one else lived to tell the tale. [PAWN_nameDef] became a loner before finding dwarfen civilization again, and still bears many a grudge to this day. [PAWN_pronoun] finds it hard to focus on things for too long, and is one of the few dwarfs that loves fresh outside air.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf child delinquent
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only child of slothful parents. [PAWN_possessive] parents were rarely interested in [PAWN_objective], and [PAWN_pronoun] therefore found more troublesome ways to get attention.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer Thane
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Thane of [PAWN_possessive] clan before being disgraced when a caravan he sent out was overrun by greenskins; everyone was killed. Now [PAWN_pronoun] seeks a noble death in battle.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a miner, once upon a time. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days under the mountain, expanding the livable space or seeking and mining rare ore. [PAWN_pronoun] survived a skaven tunnel attack that killed all [PAWN_possessive] fellow miners, after having been knocked unconcious early in the battle. Having been thusly shamed, [PAWN_pronoun] became a slayer upon waking among [PAWN_possessive] dead fellows.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer brewer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Dwarfs obtain nutrients and enjoyment from ale. [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for the ale's creation. All brewers strive to become as renowned as the great Bugman; testing recipes and variations, all while hoping to give rise to an amazing brew. [PAWN_nameDef] was head brewer at [PAWN_possessive] own facility, when it was attacked and overrun by greenskins. [PAWN_pronoun] was badly wounded, but survived; thereafter [PAWN_pronoun] took the slayer vow.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] provides the clan with food. [PAWN_possessive] skill at cooking and agricultural knowledge is vastly superior to most. [PAWN_pronoun] once sent [PAWN_possessive] only son out to gather supplies for a special meal, only to have him captured and killed by roving orcs. Distraught at what [PAWN_pronoun]'d done, [PAWN_nameDef] joined the slayer cult that day.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer trader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for negotiating trade with foreigners as well as selling Dwarfen wares. This requires travelling the world, and much bargaining. On one such adventure [PAWN_possessive] caravan was assaulted by a band of hungry ogres. Despite the ogres being defeated and sent packing, most of the caravan was dead; several were carried off to be eaten. [PAWN_nameDef] was overcome with grief and rage, and took the slayer vow that day.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the hold's engineer. [PAWN_possessive] skill at building structures, gadgets, machines and weapons is nothing but awe inspiring. One day an accident in the forge caused [PAWN_possessive] apprentice to be seriously injured, meaning the lad would never walk again. [PAWN_nameDef] could find to way to repay the boy, and so decided to take the slayer vow; serving his hold until an honourable death presented itself.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer laborer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was never good at much. [PAWN_possessive] only useful skill was aquired while training the rats that live in the kitchens and hidden areas of the hold.Not knowing what to do with [PAWN_objective]self, [PAWN_pronoun] took the slayer vow, and put [PAWN_possessive] life in service all Dwarfs until death should come.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a warrior of the hold. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to use the axe and hammer with much skill, which assisted in [PAWN_objective] building a life defending the hold from threats; from above as well as below. On a routine patrol mission [PAWN_possessive] unit was overwhelmed by a night goblin horde, and [PAWN_pronoun] wsa the only survivor. After that, the only viable option was to join the Slayers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer thunderer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Having been in the thunderer's guild for a large part of [PAWN_possessive] life, [PAWN_nameDef] became an expert at shooting and maintaining [PAWN_possessive] own weaponry. After missing a critical shot in battle that gave the target time to injure a fellow thunderer, [PAWN_nameDef] took the slayer vow. [PAWN_pronoun] disavowed all ranged weaponry, and focused [PAWN_pronoun] time and life to melee arts; seeking a valiant death at the hands of a worthy opponent.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer crafter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master craftsman. [PAWN_pronoun] was responsible for creating anything that the clan needed; including clothing, furniture, ale barrels, and even armor and weapons. After the laces on a pair of pants that he made came undone during a battle, causing the wearer to take an injury, [PAWN_nameDef] was severely self shamed, and decided to take the slayer vow to atone.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer adventurer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was never one to sit still. [PAWN_pronoun] has travelled much outside the hold, working as little as possible along the way. [PAWN_pronoun] took the slayer vow after watching a dwarfen family killed by human bandits in the distance, and being unable to get there in time to save them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer tavern keep
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] owned and operated a tavern. [PAWN_pronoun] grew adept at serving ales, diplomacy, and head-bashing. After a dirty kitchen caused the poisoning of half his clan, [PAWN_pronoun] was shamed beyond belief. The only logical step from there was to take up the mantle of the slayer, and seek an honorable death while serving the hold.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer beast hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled the mountainsides and undermountain hunting violent beasts of all types. [PAWN_pronoun] slew many foul greenskin and skaven beasts, as well as their masters. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed the thrill of the hunt, and the meat from the kill but preferred to work alone. [PAWN_pronoun] took the slayer vow after having roused a great chaos beast that killed most of [PAWN_possessive] fellow hunters.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer blacksmith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been a blacksmith [PAWN_possessive] whole life. [PAWN_pronoun] gained reknown for his skills at making weapons and armor both in times of peace as well as war. [PAWN_possessive] skill at using the weapons [PAWN_pronoun] creates is also notable. After losing a bet with a fellow blacksmith to create a weapon of legendary reknown, [PAWN_pronoun] took the slayer vow.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer grudge settler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has spent [PAWN_possessive] life helping others settle their grudges; for gold of course. [PAWN_pronoun] generally assists those that are in no shape to help themselves, and trains to keep [PAWN_possessive] skills up, in order to best handle any situation that may arise. [PAWN_pronoun] failed in such an attempt, allowing [PAWN_possessive] quarry to slip the net and do harm to [PAWN_possessive] client. After that, [PAWN_pronoun] joined the slayer cult; settling grudges for free, for any dwarf that asks, and hoping one day he'll meet his end.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer settler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was present at the founding of a new hold on multiple occasions. Such an endeavour requires a solid general grasp on all manner of tasks. [PAWN_possessive] perimeter security at one such hold was breached, and skaven invaders rushed in to murder and steal all that they could. [PAWN_nameDef] became a slayer after that, to atone for [PAWN_possessive] laxitude, and make all enemies of the dwarfs suffer.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer construction engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a construction worker, and frequently assisted in the planning process. From roof supports to bridges to homes, [PAWN_pronoun] did it all. Because [PAWN_pronoun] was always around the work crews, [PAWN_pronoun] never had to cook a meal in [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_nameDef] oversaw the construction of a bridge, that collapsed after only seventy-five years. [PAWN_possessive] shame was so great that [PAWN_pronoun] joined the slayer cult thereafter.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer escaped convict
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once denied involvement in crimes that brought about [PAWN_possessive] incarceration. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped by tunneling out of a mountain cell using modified cutlery, and sneaking past the guards while they were drunk on ale. [PAWN_pronoun] later came to his senses, as a proper dwarf, admitted [PAWN_possessive] crimes, and took the slayer vow.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer gyrocoptor pilot
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was adept at piloting a gyrocoptor. [PAWN_possessive] favorite thing in the world was soaring above the mountains and seeing the vastness of the world, and [PAWN_pronoun] much prefers it to the company of others. [PAWN_pronoun] once crashed [PAWN_possessive] precious gyrocoptor in a freak storm, and was so shamed that [PAWN_pronoun] thereafter joined the slayers in their search for an honorable demise.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer grunt worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] did menial, unskilled work around the hold. [PAWN_possessive] job also included caring for the mules and goats which were used for the transport of goods. [PAWN_possessive] lack of attention to detail once caused a dwarf maiden to slip on a wet floor, injuring her. [PAWN_pronoun] took the slayer vow at once, finally finding some solid direction for [PAWN_possessive] life: honorable death.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer gatherer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master gatherer. [PAWN_pronoun] could find food in the most barren of places using [PAWN_possessive] expansive knowledge of plants, fungi, roots, and berries. Whether on the mountainsides, or under the mountain, [PAWN_pronoun] excelled at finding the best edible morsels. [PAWN_pronoun] once mistook poisonous mushrooms for edible ones, causing the sickness of several relatives. [PAWN_pronoun] could find no way to forgive what [PAWN_pronoun]'d done, so [PAWN_pronoun] joined the slayer cult to atone.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to track and trap any animal through the most dangerous of places, above ground or below, and had extensive knowledge of many ingenious methods of taking down specific large animals. [PAWN_pronoun] was once grieviously injured by a warg while hunting it; upon recovery [PAWN_pronoun] took the slayer vow to make amends for [PAWN_possessive] oversight during that hunt.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer loner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] never cared much for the clan leaders and their decisions. [PAWN_pronoun] prefered independence both physically and mentally, and spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time alone, occasionally visiting with family and [PAWN_possessive] very few friends, but never for long. [PAWN_pronoun] was once gone for several years, only to return and find both of [PAWN_possessive] parents deceased. Distraught at having missed their passing, [PAWN_pronoun] joined the slayer cult.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer guild master
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lead a dwarfen guild, making decisions on production, apprentice assignments, general budgeting, and much more. This position of power gave [PAWN_objective] influence over the lives of many, and made many fear and resent [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_nameDef] grew to hate what [PAWN_pronoun]'d become; and foreswore it in exchange for the simple life of a slayer.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer mercenary leader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] led what started off as small band of mercenaries that sold their axes to the highest bidder for gold. Eventually the company grew, as did their notoriety; reaching a point where [PAWN_nameDef] claimed they were known throughout the Olde World over. [PAWN_possessive] company was defeated at the hands of lizardman warriors while searching an ancient site in the new world. The surivors all took the slayer vow, shamed at having survived after so many of their brethren had perished.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer message carrier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for carrying messages from hold to hold. Be it by gyrocoptor, beast, afoot, or on water, [PAWN_pronoun] got the messages there despite all obstacles. [PAWN_pronoun] failed in that duty on [PAWN_possessive] last job, losing the message after imbibing a large quantity of Bugman's XXX that [PAWN_pronoun] won gambling along the way. [PAWN_pronoun] disavowed all further message carrying, and took the slayer vow.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer pugilist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fighter, and preferred to do so for money. [PAWN_pronoun] squared off against many challengers, and won more than [PAWN_pronoun] lost. [PAWN_pronoun] took a prize fight versus a smaller dwarf, and lost. [PAWN_possessive] pride was so wounded that the only fix was to join the slayer cult.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer sailor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] traversed the oceans on journeys of exploration, seeking out plant and animal specimens from exotic places, and occasionally fending off pirates on a dwarfen steam ship. [PAWN_pronoun] is a rare dwarf that loved the sea so much [PAWN_pronoun] refused to do all but the barest minimum of work on land, except to sell the treasures [PAWN_pronoun] collected. [PAWN_pronoun] was the sole survivor of a shipwreck, and was saddened enough afterwards to want to seek a noble death, on land.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer smuggler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for stealing goods, and trafficking contraband without getting caught. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually saved up enough to buy a ship, and used it to travel around the Olde World dealing [PAWN_possessive] goods in person. [PAWN_pronoun] later decided to atone for his crimes by taking the slayer vow.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer pirate
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Piracy appears everywhere that leadership is weak and where society is spread thin. [PAWN_nameDef] was part of this age-old part of existence, extorting and plundering peaceful trade ships for profit. [PAWN_pronoun] hoped to one day win the level of the infamy of the much lauded Long Drong's Slayer Pirates. As irony would have it, [PAWN_pronoun] grew to see the error of [PAWN_possessive] ways, and decided to join the slayer cult.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer taster
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was brought on as the taster for a thane after his lordship suffered a vicious case of food poisoning. Any dish served at the royal table had to be sampled first by [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] lived a decadent lifestyle at court, getting fat and doing very little work. It turns out that [PAWN_possessive] constitution was greather than that of his benefactor, and [PAWN_pronoun] imbibed some poisoned food that caused [PAWN_objective] no ill effects, but sicked his thane greatly. [PAWN_pronoun] was distraught at this, blamed [PAWN_possessive]self, and took the slayer vow thereafter.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer treasure hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] explored the width and breadth of the Olde Worlde in search of treasure, with little success. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually struck out for the jungles of the new world, where [PAWN_pronoun] hit it big by finding a large golden statue of some bizarre lizard creature. [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] lads made it back to civilization, and made a fortune selling the statue off to a rich Imperial citizen. [PAWN_pronoun] later denounced [PAWN_possessive] life of luxury, and took the slayer vow. Seeing it as a great alternative, and way of atonement for [PAWN_possessive] excess.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer actor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has travelled the Olde World with a company of actors, playing in packed theatres filled with loving audiences everywhere. [PAWN_pronoun] was a perfectionist, and made [PAWN_possessive] own props and costumes rather than use the ones [PAWN_pronoun] was given. [PAWN_pronoun] was shamed one night after forgetting [PAWN_objective] lines to a packed house audience, and joined the slayer cult.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer veteranarian
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] treated sick and injured animals for a living. Seeing their suffering affected [PAWN_possessive] stance on the practice of eating meat, and for many years [PAWN_pronoun] lived as a vegetarian, rejecting the meat-loving culinary tradition of [PAWN_possessive] most dwarfs. On [PAWN_possessive] last job, [PAWN_pronoun] was unable to save [PAWN_possessive] father's prized ibex. [PAWN_possessive] shame at failing was so great that [PAWN_pronoun] took the slayer vow thereafter.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer con artist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] never created anything in [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] did, however, prove to be a natural at getting others to give [PAWN_possessive] what they had created. [PAWN_pronoun] prefered to use these skills on non-dwarfs, but occasionally took advantage of [PAWN_possessive] own kind; although only under dire personal circumstances, of course. [PAWN_pronoun] later grew shameful of [PAWN_possessive] actions, and took the slayer vow to atone for those crimes.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slayer minstrel
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a traveling entertainer. [PAWN_pronoun] could be found telling stories or singing songs, and is capable of protecting [PAWN_objective]self from the dangers of the road. However, [PAWN_pronoun] was always conspicuously absent whenever there was hard labour to be done. [PAWN_pronoun] was shamed one night at performace, after not intervening in a mismatched fight between a longbeard and three beardlings; [PAWN_pronoun] joined the slayer cult thereafter.
